name: Culinary Chicanery
description:
For Weekly Game Jam 95, theme Bad Cooking.

Sick of not owning awards for culinary prowess, you've decided to change that.

Unfortunately, you're super bad at cooking. Like real bad.

Thankfully, you're not that bad at stealing magic artifacts, and so you're going to use this demon belt to your advantage! Watch your three cooking stations to make sure they're tended to, while casting a little bit of devious dark magic at the right time to mess up your opponent. Make sure to not get caught by the judge!

Step on the heads of other chefs as you make a name for yourself who isn't that great but is somehow better than everybody else in this competition???

Controls are entirely arrow keys and spacebar, and the (verbose) instructions are in-game. 

Currently there is a bug that does not allow the game to reset back to the main menu cleanly, so that is removed. It's something I'm working on fixing and seem to be flummoxed by. Just reload the page if you'd like another stab at it.
